General.Name: NCT Alliance Bhd
General.Description: NCT Alliance Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development business in Malaysia. The company develops real estate properties, including residential and commercial properties. It also operates as a general and renovation work contractor. The company was formerly known as Grand-Flo Berhad and changed its name to NCT Alliance Berhad in July 2021. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Puchong, Malaysia. NCT Alliance Berhad is a subsidiary of YBG Yap Consolidated Sdn. Bhd.
